Text: Oh please HELP MEEE I have no idea how to use these subtitle files... I am missing out on so many good movies.. tried to DL vob sub before after reading comments but still could not work it out. HELP!! - grateful nicki

thnx a lot lord terabyte. 

@ ANicki_InTheUk
just use jet audio software to play the movie and it has a option to use the sub files. press the help button of jet audio and I hope it'll make you understand how to use the sub files.  enjoy.
